ComicInfo.Title: Breathing Space; The Party's Over!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Breathing Space: The Resistance plans to reach the Avatar quarters by traversing outside the hull of the Siovansin. They are confronted by the Guard at the exit portal. Omios and C'rys are killed while Jason and Ninivir head outside to complete the mission. Niniri is told Jason is still alive. As a result, Rienhrie and Dai are brought in for questioning by Sere and Vinyr. They commit suicide but Vinyr is able to read vital information about the Resistance from their thoughts before they die.
The Party's Over!: Panda Khan battles Lord Shibo's bat creatures who have invaded Wu-Kung. Yu finds Ching washed up on the bank of cavern. As they explore the cavern, they are confronted by a giant insect like creature.
